title: UAE announces prayer timings for today: Fajr at 5:37am, Maghrib at sunset
summary_full: Official prayer timings for Tuesday, February 3, 2026, have been released by AWQAF across the UAE, with Fajr prayers commencing at 5:41 AM in Abu Dhabi and 5:37 AM in Dubai. The article also highlights post-prayer practices like Dhikr and Ayat al-Kursi recitation for spiritual clarity. Ramadan 2026 is anticipated to begin around February 18th, falling during the cooler season.
